name: Catch The Subs
description:
Catch as many subs as you can before the time runs out. Watch out for combos!

If you enjoyed this game, please share and consider supporting the streamers and/or donating to charities. Thank you.

Featured Twitch streamers:
https://www.twitch.tv/poponut
https://www.twitch.tv/shykurobooo
https://www.twitch.tv/ninjapandaowl
